judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed at appellant’s cost.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Emanuel Moss, Louis I. Metzman and Moss & Moss, for appellee, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Feldman v. Blofstein, Appellant.
Argued November 27, 1946.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Nathan Lavine, for appellant.
Emanuel Moss, Louis I. Metzman and Moss & Moss, for appellee, were not heard.
November 27, 1946:
